name: one-yeah Party Game
description: This is a social party game centered around answering questions. Multiple users can connect, and engage by taking turns responding to thought-provoking personal questions.
steps: Users can create new lobbies or join existing ones made by others.
The room creator becomes the host and starts the game when everyone joins.
During the game, a random question is fetched from an API, and a user in the room is chosen to answer.
The chosen user can either answer the question (earning 1 point) or pass (earning 0 points).
The first user to reach 5 points wins.
